I have been trying to load different pages on my facebook for two days and the pages are not loading correctly. It tries to connect to the page and then a message comes up that I have lost connection. My computer is still connected to the internet but is out of sync.

Reproducible: Always
comments.author: stacycole44@yahoo.com
comments.creator: stacycole44@yahoo.com

I have been trying to load different pages on my facebook for two days and the pages are not loading correctly. It tries to connect to the page and then a message comes up that I have lost connection. My computer is still connected to the internet but is out of sync.

Reproducible: Always

comments.raw_text: the computer is out of sync on all pages I try, not just facebook
